profiles: Summary Andrea Chaves is a consultant in the Strategy and Analytics Practice of IBM Global Business Services. Miss Chaves graduated with highest distinction from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill with a BS in Business Administration. Outside of her leadership roles in various student led organizations at Chapel Hill, Andrea worked as a marketing associate at Demographics Pro, a startup Twitter analytics provider specializing in delivering actionable insight to marketing professionals and social media analysts. While at Demographics Pro, Andrea served as the customer service liaison and played an integral role in the planning, execution, and development of subsequent product roll outs. Andrea is open to new experiences to enrich her skill set and further diversify her portfolio. Summary Hello, and thank you for visiting my profile!  
 
In summary, I am a high-energy, animated young professional who is passionate about implementing creativity in both artistic and professional settings. 
 
I have worked in the areas of web design, database development, management, public relations, sales, and consulting as well as fruit sculpting and wedding planning. Through studying BIT and Marketing at Virginia Tech I was able to discern IT consulting as my ideal dovetail of technology and human interaction blended with constantly evolving challenges.  
 
If you would like to contact me, please reach out to daniella.damiano@gmail.com 
 
I look forward to connecting with you soon,

Judo, black belt 2nd dan bicycle (basic repair) See 3+     See less Education Università degli Studi di Milano Master's degree,  Physics , 102/110 2011  – 2013 Thesis Title: "Superconducting qubits coupled through a resonator within the quantum Rabi model framework".  
In this thesis I studied analytically and numerically the properties of a system made by one or two superconducting qubits coupled with a bosonic field in a particular coupling regime called "deep strong coupling". In this regime the Jaynes-Cummings model is not longer valid and the full quantum Rabi model must be considered. 
In particular I focused on the generation of entanglement between the two qubits with a numerical analysis for different qubits frequencies regimes. Università degli Studi di Milano Bachelor's degree,  Physics , 94/110 2006  – 2011 Thesis Title: "Studio delle caratteristiche di impulsi laser generati da cristalli "periodically polled"". 
In this thesis I studied computationally the characteristics of a laser pulse generated and amplified by paremetic down conversion from a laser pump that pass throughout a non-linear and periodically polled crystall.
